fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Heal 1 HP from yourself and players adjacent to you.  Prevents Poisoned this phase and takes 1 phase off existing Poisoned status for yourself.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Heal 2 HP from yourself and players adjacent to you.  Prevents Poisoned this phase and takes 1 phase off existing Poisoned status for all 3 players.

*This cardâ€™s effect takes place at the end of the phase. Playerlist position swapping affects the adjacent targets of this card.*
